text: 22046002278600 a new carpet a poodle a ice cream backrub a suicide pact what what carla what the hell do you want
label: Ses02M_script02_2_M028

text: no
label: F:

text: 22691002303000 i want something to turn out the way that it supposed to
label: Ses02M_script02_2_F028

text: 22951002424500 well welcome to the human race all right do you think this is what i had in mind when i proposed you think i had this great fantasy going that four years down the road wed come to the beach and yell at each other over fish
label: Ses02M_script02_2_M029

text: 24259002521500 you think i knew that there be times when youd look at me like im a used kleenex or that id look at you and think holy hell when is the next flight to alaska
label: Ses02M_script02_2_M030

text: 25228002684300 no no just like you i thought it was going to be all like peaches and roses and sand in our toes and wind in our hair and the fish will always come and the bills will pay themselves and well have three fat rosy kids and haha baby the joke is on us
label: Ses02M_script02_2_M031

text: 26845662714900 cause you know what you get carla you know what you get this
label: Ses02M_script02_2_M032

text: 27103002752900 this what what is this this isnt even anything
label: Ses02M_script02_2_F029

text: 27559002806800 im sure this is standing on the beach this is waiting this is fighting
label: Ses02M_script02_2_F030

text: 28109002864000 well but this isnt anything like i thought anything would be like
label: Ses02M_script02_2_F031

text: 28609002882300 no i know me neither
label: Ses02M_script02_2_M035

text: 28738002997400 i mean its  this is just this i mean it includes a lot and everything but isnt something else do you have any idea what im trying to say
label: Ses02M_script02_2_F032

text: 30026003026200 im doing the best i can
label: Ses02M_script02_2_M036

text: 30254003065600 i know that augie really i do
label: Ses02M_script02_2_F033

text: 30705003214700 i know that you meant this to be special and nice and theres the sand and the moon and everything but i just couldnt help thinking about being somewhere else
label: Ses02M_script02_2_F034

text: 32235003260200 maybe if you were with somebody else too
label: Ses02M_script02_2_M037

text: 32513003271900 i didnt say that
label: Ses02M_script02_2_F035

text: 32634003322600 no i know but still i know i dont make you happy
label: Ses02M_script02_2_M038

text: 33138003352600 for heavens sake whatever im doing id rather be doing it with you
label: Ses02M_script02_2_F036

text: 33813003411800 dont be ridiculous i mean dont you know that
label: Ses02M_script02_2_F037

text: 34120003485500 youre the one who probably wishes he was with someone else someone who knew how to enjoy herself and didnt take everything so hard
label: Ses02M_script02_2_F038

text: 34892003531800 now that you mention it no i dont
label: Ses02M_script02_2_M040

text: 35305003620800 okay  fine so were in the wrong spot but were with the right person
label: Ses02M_script02_2_F039

text: 36224723683500 i dont know it seemed like a pretty good spot to me look at the moon  view the moon view i got from here
label: Ses02M_script02_2_M041

text: 36865003755900 yes i noticed that it looks pretty on the water doesnt it big old white moon
label: Ses02M_script02_2_F040

text: 37627003784300 what have we got here
label: Ses02M_script02_2_M042

text: 37826003813100 augie you brought refreshments
label: Ses02M_script02_2_F041

text: 38105003829400 its not champagne
label: Ses02M_script02_2_M043

text: 38272003854800 well i guess we dont need glasses
label: Ses02M_script02_2_F042

text: 38774003915400 you still cold do you want my jacket do you want to go home
label: Ses02M_script02_2_M044

text: 39192004001200 no no i think you might be right i think this may be the spot after all
label: Ses02M_script02_2_F043

text: 40383004060200 augie im sorry
label: Ses02M_script02_2_F044

text: 40530004094800 shh if were very quiet the fish might come
label: Ses02M_script02_2_M045

text: 00676080086428 do you think its them
label: Ses02M_script03_1_F000

text: 00914620122099 well nobody knows were here except freda and she wouldnt ring up
label: Ses02M_script03_1_F001

text: 01153410134564 must be them then
label: Ses02M_script03_1_M002

text: 01300590157092 what are we going to do
label: Ses02M_script03_1_F002

text: 01626490191183 were all right darling arent we whatever happens
label: Ses02M_script03_1_M003

text: 01853260208905 now and always sweet
label: Ses02M_script03_1_F003

text: 02037990220920 i dont care then
label: Ses02M_script03_1_M004

text: 02137110241945 its bound to come sooner or later
label: Ses02M_script03_1_F004

text: 02373180303521 hello hello what wrong number
label: Ses02M_script03_1_M005

text: 02934580331455 oh it sends shivers down my spine
label: Ses02M_script03_1_F005

text: 03239460354283 what do we do if they suddenly walk in on us
label: Ses02M_script03_1_M006

text: 03491760376510 behave exquisitely
label: Ses02M_script03_1_F006

text: 03685500389426 with the most perfect poise
label: Ses02M_script03_1_M007

text: 03814660422165 yes i should probably to a court curtsey
label: Ses02M_script03_1_F007

text: 04178100462415 things that ought to matter dreadfully dont matter at all when ones is happy do they
label: Ses02M_script03_1_M008

text: 04571580491550 whats so horrible is that one cant stay happy
label: Ses02M_script03_1_F008

text: 04831400502964 oh darling dont say that
label: Ses02M_script03_1_M009

text: 04968070533001 its true the whole business is a very poor joke
label: Ses02M_script03_1_F009

text: 05278950564840 meaning that sacred and beautiful thing love
label: Ses02M_script03_1_M010

text: 05585320580008 yes meaning just that
label: Ses02M_script03_1_F010

text: 05785060669518 what does it all mean thats what i ask thats what i ask myself in my ceaseless quest for ultimate truth  good god what does it all mean
label: Ses02M_script03_1_M011

text: 06572020683785 dont laugh at me im serious
label: Ses02M_script03_1_F011

text: 06764260707814 you mustnt be serious my dear one thats just what they want
label: Ses02M_script03_1_M012

text: 07106680790343 all those futile moralists who try to make life unbearable laugh at them be flippant laugh at everything all their sacred shibboleths
label: Ses02M_script03_1_M013

text: 07909410830664 flippancy brings out the acid in their damned sweetness in light
label: Ses02M_script03_1_M014

text: 08215030855445 well if i laugh at everything then i must laugh at us too
label: Ses02M_script03_1_F013

text: 08485360881727 certainly you must we figures of fun all right
label: Ses02M_script03_1_M015

text: 08769210914166 well shall we always want to bicker and fight
label: Ses02M_script03_1_F014

text: 09083090946456 no that desire will fade along with our passion
label: Ses02M_script03_1_M016

text: 09424010967481 oh dear should we like that
label: Ses02M_script03_1_F015

text: 09623750987456 depends on how well we play it
label: Ses02M_script03_1_M017

text: 09826501034163 well what happens if one of us dies does the one thats left still laugh
label: Ses02M_script03_1_F016

text: 10271041055789 yes yes with all his might
label: Ses02M_script03_1_M018

text: 10518841075613 well thats serious enough isnt it
label: Ses02M_script03_1_F017

text: 10672031127727 no no it isnt death is very laughable such a cunning little mystery all done with mirrors
label: Ses02M_script03_1_M019

text: 11220201153408 darling i believe youre talking nonsense
label: Ses02M_script03_1_F018

text: 11477011173683 so is everyone else in the long run
label: Ses02M_script03_1_M020

text: 11738331310900 lets be superficial and pity the poor philosophers lets blow our trumpets and squeakers and enjoy the party as much as we can like quite idiotic very small school children lets savor the delight of the moment
label: Ses02M_script03_1_M021

text: 13111991359153 come kiss me darling before your body rots and worms pop in and out of your eye sockets
label: Ses02M_script03_1_M022

text: 13543541380486 elliot worms dont pop
label: Ses02M_script03_1_F019

text: 13744781495226 i dont care what you do see you can paint yourself green and dance naked in the place vendome and rush off madly with all the men in the world and i shant say a word as long as you love me best
label: Ses02M_script03_1_M023

text: 14848631558903 thank you dear the same applies you except that if i catch you so much as looking at another woman ill kill you
label: Ses02M_script03_1_F020

text: 15528961589541 you remember that awful scene we had in venice
label: Ses02M_script03_1_M024

text: 15797791606512 which particular one
label: Ses02M_script03_1_F021

text: 16021561652468 the one when you bought that little painted wooden snake in the piazza and put it on my bed
label: Ses02M_script03_1_M025

text: 16416551693167 oh charles that was his name charles it did wiggle so beautifully
label: Ses02M_script03_1_F022

text: 16873101709537 horrible thing i hated it
label: Ses02M_script03_1_M026

text: 16994751766757 i know you did you threw it out of the window into the grand canal i dont think ill ever forgive you for that
label: Ses02M_script03_1_F023

text: 17601491782226 how long did that row last
label: Ses02M_script03_1_M027

text: 17748671802651 it went on intermittently for days
label: Ses02M_script03_1_F024

text: 17991971850409 the worst one was in cannes when your curling iron burned a hole in my new dressing gown
label: Ses02M_script03_1_M028

text: 18349411880446 it burned my comb too and all the towels in the bathroom
label: Ses02M_script03_1_F025

text: 18672301893062 that was a rouser wasnt it
label: Ses02M_script03_1_M029

text: 18860031918743 that was the first time you ever hit me
label: Ses02M_script03_1_F026

text: 19133361937366 i didnt hit you very hard
label: Ses02M_script03_1_M030

text: 19277542006450 the manager came in and found us rolling around on the floor biting and scratching like panthers
label: Ses02M_script03_1_F027

text: 19930842018314 ill never forget his face
label: Ses02M_script03_1_M031

text: 20076512053307 oh it was ridiculous completely ridiculous
label: Ses02M_script03_1_F028

text: 20463992070278 we were very much younger then
label: Ses02M_script03_1_M032

text: 20648712092956 and very much sillier
label: Ses02M_script03_1_F029

text: 20872492135908 as a matter of fact the real cause of that row was peter burden
label: Ses02M_script03_1_M033

text: 00334670072362 as a matter of fact the real cause of that row was peter burden
label: Ses02M_script03_2_M000

text: 00618700092081 you knew there was nothing in that
label: Ses02M_script03_2_F000

text: 00806840117227 i knew nothing of the sort you took presents from him
label: Ses02M_script03_2_M001

text: 01085430138031 presents just a trivial little broach
label: Ses02M_script03_2_F001

text: 01286240193026 yes i remember it well bristling with diamonds in the worst possible taste
label: Ses02M_script03_2_M002

text: 01781920227036 no it wasnt it was very pretty i still have it and i wear it often
label: Ses02M_script03_2_F002

text: 02169050258152 you went out of your way to torture me over peter burden
label: Ses02M_script03_2_M003

text: 02429560286373 no i didnt you worked the whole thing up in your jealous imagination
label: Ses02M_script03_2_F003

text: 02784130313147 you must admit he was in love with you wasnt he
label: Ses02M_script03_2_M004

text: 03035590339378 just a little perhaps nothing serious
label: Ses02M_script03_2_F004

text: 03341320360725 you let him kiss you you said you did
label: Ses02M_script03_2_M005

text: 03713980401248 it gave him a lot of pleasure it didnt hurt me any
label: Ses02M_script03_2_F006

text: 03940110414815 what about me
label: Ses02M_script03_2_M007

text: 04073980456966 well if you hadnt been so nosey and suspicious you never wouldnt have known anything about it
label: Ses02M_script03_2_F007

text: 04500920478675 thats a nice point of view i must say
label: Ses02M_script03_2_M008

text: 04728860502012 im bored of this conversation
label: Ses02M_script03_2_F008

text: 04964040543077 yes me too bored stiff you want some brandy
label: Ses02M_script03_2_M009

text: 05521220575821 i have a little i think
label: Ses02M_script03_2_M010

text: 05707560618515 i dont see why you want any youve already had two glasses
label: Ses02M_script03_2_F010

text: 06132680655419 no particular reason anyhow they are very small ones
label: Ses02M_script03_2_M011

text: 06480020691600 it just seems so silly to go on and on and on with such a thing
label: Ses02M_script03_2_F011

text: 06856300752204 you can hardly call three liquor glasses in a whole evening going on and on and on
label: Ses02M_script03_2_M012

text: 07418920769751 well its become a habit with you
label: Ses02M_script03_2_F012

text: 07636010809912 you neednt be so grand just because dont happen want any yourself right now
label: Ses02M_script03_2_M013

text: 07965250819681 dont be so stupid
label: Ses02M_script03_2_F013

text: 08108170830716 really amanda
label: Ses02M_script03_2_M014

text: 09081440957350 no im just making myself fascinating for you
label: Ses02M_script03_2_F015

text: 08820930911400 going out somewhere dear
label: Ses02M_script03_2_M016

text: 09734511005290 its a womans job to allure the man
label: Ses02M_script03_2_F016

text: 09488470982496 that reply has broken my heart
label: Ses02M_script03_2_M017

text: 10056521028988 watch me a minute will you
label: Ses02M_script03_2_F017

text: 10233801056305 as a matter of fact thats perfectly true
label: Ses02M_script03_2_M018

text: 10483451066979 oh no it isnt
label: Ses02M_script03_2_F018

text: 10794611125230 its a pity you didnt have any more brandy it might have made you a little less disagreeable
label: Ses02M_script03_2_M020

text: 11143761142054 it doesnt seem to work such wonders with you
label: Ses02M_script03_2_F020

text: 11362651166295 snap snap snap like a little adder
label: Ses02M_script03_2_M021

text: 11630391186557 adders dont snap they sting
label: Ses02M_script03_2_F021

text: 11773311219120 oh nonsense they have a little bag of venom behind their fangs and they snap
label: Ses02M_script03_2_M022

text: 12279841296366 i dont care do you understand i dont care i dont care if they bark or roll about like hoops
label: Ses02M_script03_2_F023

text: 12940141336165 tell me did you see much of peter burden after our divorce
label: Ses02M_script03_2_M024

text: 13312811366919 yes i did quite a lot
label: Ses02M_script03_2_F024

text: 13576931396407 i imagine you let him kiss you good deal more then
label: Ses02M_script03_2_M025

text: 13860951407623 mind your own business
label: Ses02M_script03_2_F025

text: 14011101431502 what riotous time you must have had
label: Ses02M_script03_2_M026

text: 14318641470035 no restraint at all very enjoyable never had much anyhow
label: Ses02M_script03_2_M027

text: 14611711503864 youre quite insufferable i expect its because youre drunk
label: Ses02M_script03_2_F026

text: 14933721526839 i am not in the least drunk
label: Ses02M_script03_2_M028

text: 15514421649131 i imagine as i may have already mentioned ive had three minute liquor glasses of brandy the whole evening long a child of two couldnt get drunk on that
label: Ses02M_script03_2_M029

text: 16359251694719 on the contrary a child of two could get violently drunk on only one glass of brandy
label: Ses02M_script03_2_F027

text: 16815131737775 oh very interesting how about a child of four a child of six or a child of nine
label: Ses02M_script03_2_M030

text: 17403071787343 we can get a good little debate going about that dont you think intemperate tots
label: Ses02M_script03_2_M031

text: 17786591815202 not very funny my dear you better have some more brandy
label: Ses02M_script03_2_F029

text: 18099561836368 all right i will
label: Ses02M_script03_2_M032

text: 18551821876529 better turn that off i think
label: Ses02M_script03_2_M033

text: 18844891921755 because its late and itll annoy the people upstairs
label: Ses02M_script03_2_M034

text: 19123481955404 there arent any people upstairs its a photographers studio
label: Ses02M_script03_2_F031

text: 19492531978379 there are people downstairs i suppose
label: Ses02M_script03_2_M035

text: 19687911993936 theyre away in tunis
label: Ses02M_script03_2_F032

text: 19890522025595 this is no time of the year for tunis
label: Ses02M_script03_2_M036

text: 20172732046218 turn it on again please
label: Ses02M_script03_2_F033

text: 20371732063947 ill do no such thing
label: Ses02M_script03_2_M037

text: 20585202110439 very well if you insist on being boorish and idiotic
label: Ses02M_script03_2_F034

text: 21042892133414 turn it off its driving me mad
label: Ses02M_script03_2_M038

text: 21214752163264 you are far too temperamental try to control yourself
label: Ses02M_script03_2_F035

text: 21636252184471 stop it stop it i hate you
label: Ses02M_script03_2_F036

text: 21712242197817 amanda listen listen
label: Ses02M_script03_2_M040

text: 21847912243586 listen indeed im sick and tired of listening to you damn sadistic bully
label: Ses02M_script03_2_F037

text: 22320082256611 very amusing indeed
label: Ses02M_script03_2_M041

text: 22444902309616 stop it stop it i hate you do you hear youre overbearing and conceited and utterly impossible
label: Ses02M_script03_2_F038

text: 23020182366782 youre a vile tempered loose living wicked little beast and i hope i never see you again as long as i live
label: Ses02M_script03_2_M042

text: 23584602400792 this is the end do you hear the end finally and forever
label: Ses02M_script03_2_F039

text: 23933752414722 youre not going like this
label: Ses02M_script03_2_M043

text: 24259382540263 yes i am let go of me youre cruel fiend and i hate and loathe you thank god i realized who you really are before i would ever ever marry you again i would never marry you again id rather die in torment
label: Ses02M_script03_2_F041

text: 24818382579346 i wouldnt marry you again if you came to me on your bended knees youre a evil minded little vampire i hope to god i never see you again as long as i live
label: Ses02M_script03_2_M047

text: 25406512579526 youre a beast i hate you stop it stop it
label: Ses02M_script03_2_F042
